Esper (Palo Alto, CA) - Engineer - H1B, FULL-TIME, and INTERN are all welcome --- Check us out at http://esper.com/jobs.html We're venture-backed, have a stellar group of engineers (OCaml back-end - ONLY COMPANY IN THE BAY AREA, JS, iOS, Android front-end), and we're looking for another early full-stack engineer to join our small team of five.

We make software for executive assistants - it sounds small, but you'll soon get why we think it's game-changing. Also, you get an assistant when you join. :)
